text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Interview with US political activist and philosopher Noam Chomsky
text.summary: Michael Dranove interviews political activist, linguist and philosopher Noam Chomsky about the background of protests against the 60th NATO conference, as well as the revival of leftwing labor actions such as mass strikes in the US and around the world.
